meta.title: Nuxt Shade Kit
meta.appDescription: A modern full-stack template project based on Nuxt 4 + Tailwind CSS v4 + shadcn-vue, integrated with OAuth authentication, API security protection, and unified UI system
meta.appKeywords: Nuxt 4, Vue 3, Tailwind CSS, shadcn-vue, TypeScript, OAuth, nuxt-auth-utils, nuxt-security, full-stack template, project scaffold
meta.ogDescription: A modern full-stack template project based on Nuxt 4 + Tailwind CSS v4 + shadcn-vue, integrated with OAuth authentication and API security protection
meta.twitterDescription: A modern full-stack template project based on Nuxt 4 + Tailwind CSS v4 + shadcn-vue

index.title: Build Modern Web Applications
index.description: A modern frontend template project based on Nuxt 4 + Tailwind CSS v4 + shadcn-vue, with built-in basic login functionality, unified UI system, and comprehensive engineering configuration. It can serve as a starting point for enterprise-level projects or a scaffold for rapid personal development.
